title: Help just need 25 more rp
body:
HI,
I unlocked all the chests that can be bought with ip and bought 2 augment caches for the cores i unlocked my project blue print however im 25rp off buying one more augment cache to unlock a border please can you help

replies.body:
These types of requests are handled through our [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) twitter team or in a [support ticket request.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
